snippet: The rebel claims came as the international envoy on the Syria crisis met with Russian and American officials in hopes of finding a political solution to the conflict.
abstract: Syrian rebels, led by jihadist battalions, say they seized largest helicopter base in country's north, potentially significant blow against government’s air war that also highlights questions about prominent role of Islamic extremists in rebellion.

byline.contributor: Nick Cumming-Bruce contributed reporting from Geneva, and Hwaida Saad from Beirut.

lead_paragraph: The rebel claims came as the international envoy on the Syria crisis met with Russian and American officials in hopes of finding a political solution to the conflict.

headline.seo: Syrian Rebels Say They Seized Key Base in North
headline.main: Syrian Rebels Say They Seized Helicopter Base in the North
headline.print_headline: Syrian Rebels Say They Seized Helicopter Base in the North

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
